<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Share Rage](/Feats.aspx?ID=5843) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=541" />
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=727" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 81 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Requirements**
You haven’t used this ability since you last Raged.

</column>

---

You stoke an ally's fury. While you are raging, one willing creature within 30 feet gains the effects of the [Rage](/Actions.aspx?ID=2802) action, except it can still use [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561) actions. It doesn't get any added benefits from your instinct, feats, or the like.

<title level="2">Share Rage leads to...</title>
[Contagious Rage](/Feats.aspx?ID=5878)
